property.name: Battleships repair at end of round
Move existing fighters to new carriers
notes
property.value:
Okay first job is to make this
guide a bit easier to read.
Move your mouse over the left
edge of this notes section.

Hold left-mousebutton and
drag to make this section wider.
Make sure you can completely
see the picture above
of East Africa.

Great! Many windows in TripleA can be adjusted this way.

Objective

First objective: Capture British Somaliland.
To achieve this you need to do a few things:
  • Move around the map: Hold right mousebutton and drag
  • Find Somalia.....
  • Select the infantry: Left mouseclick on the unit
  • Move it to British Somaliland
  • Drop the infantry: Left mouseclick to drop
  • When captured the territory will change color to dark brown
TripleA has a few more options to move around the map and select units:
Have a look in the Help-tab(Top-left of your screen).
Look in the Movement/Selection help-section.
Try out the different options and find one you like best.
Tip: Using the minimap to move around on the big map works great!


Captured British Somaliland?

Then go to the Actions-tab next to the Notes-tab and click Done.


New unit info

So you got yourselves a brand new Armour hey?
If you want to get some info on your new units you have a few options:
  • Have a look in the Help-tab(Top-left of your screen).
    Look in the Unit help-section.
  • Hover the mouse over the unit and press CTRL+V or CTRL+I

Objective

Attack Slovakia Hungary: Move the 2 infantry from Germany to Slovakia Hungary for the attack. Use the armour to blitz Greater Southern Germany and join the attack in Slovakia Hungary!

Before starting battle first check below how battles work in TripleA.

Battle




This is the Battlewindow.
The attacker fires first. For each unit a die is rolled.

Infantry have an Attackpower of 1 which means each rolled 1 is a hit. In the above example both Infantry missed (Rolled 3 and 2).
Armour have an Attackpower of 3. So for each 1,2 or 3 they score a hit(50% chance).
In this case the Armour rolled a 3 thus a hit. The enemy Infantry is hit, but still has a chance to return fire, see the picture below.


The enemy Infantry was hit, but still has a defense roll.
Infantry has a Defensepower of 2, so each 1 or 2 scores a hit (33%).
In this case it scored a defensive hit(2) and now Germany has to select a casualty. Select an Infantry as casualty because it is the cheaper and weaker unit.

If neither side won the battle you have the option to continue fighting or retreat. When retreating all units retreat to one territory where at least one attacking unit came from. So in this case you can retreat to either Germany or Greater Southern Germany.

To continue click Actions >> Done and then Battle in Slovakia Hungary...
If you lost the battlewindow you cand find it in your taskbar, bottom of your screen.



Collect income
This is the end of your turn. The value of all your territories will be added and payed out as PUs (Production Units).


Purchase
In this fase you buy new units to build up your army.
The new units you buy now can be placed at the end ouf your turn, after all movement and battles.

Objective

Capture Poland! Poland is better defended so you will need more units.

If you doubt your attacking army is strong enough you can use the Battle Calculator. This usefull tool gives you a good indication of your chance of succes in battle.

To use the Battle Calculator:
  • Move all attacking units to the target territory.
  • Hover the mouse over the target territory.
  • press CTRL+B
  • In the Battle Calculator window press Calculate Odds
  • The top-right number is your chance of succes.
  • If you don't like your odds you can Undo your CombatMoves.
Note: The Battle Calculator gives you a chance of succes, no guarantee! After all this is a game with Dice!
